title: sound sample of that creature
extract: noun. the sound or sounds uttered through the mouth of living creatures, especially of human beings in speaking, shouting, singing, etc. ... a range of such sounds distinctive to one person, or to a type of person or animal: Her voice is commanding.
extract_html: noun. the sound or sounds uttered through the mouth of living creatures, especially of human beings in speaking, shouting, singing, etc. ... a range of such sounds distinctive to one person, or to a type of person or animal: Her voice is commanding.
